name: Yokai Tanken Chimachima
overview: Another winner of Bothtec's first programming contest, Youkai Tantei Chima Chima is an arcade game similar to Pac-Man. In this game players will control a cyclops called Chima Chima who will fight against ghosts. In order to defeat the ghosts, Chima Chima shoots bouncing fireballs. These fireballs move together with the protagonist and can kill him so players will need to avoid enemies and have the fireballs explode next to them. Players can receive a bonus score for having blown up more enemies using one fireball. There are 9 stages in total in the game.
